name: Brain In My Head
description: Brain In My Head is a funny casual arcade shooter with stylish graphics. Kill hordes of zombies and have fun!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Core 2 Duo or higher Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512 mb DirectX: Version 9.0c Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: i3 or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1 gb DirectX: Version 9.0c Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
